channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page Builder: Live Composer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page Builder: Live Composer

item.title: CVE-2022-4669|2024-08-03T01:48:39.837Z -- unknown -- page%20builder%3A%20live%20composer
item.description: The Page Builder: Live Composer WordPress plugin before 1.5.23 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
